Package com.example.android.picmymedphotohandler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GalleryActivity
    GalleryActivity performs actions on the database and the GalleryAdapter settings to show the Gallery
    GalleryAdapter
    This class is an adapter for GalleryActivity to show the images using RecyclerView.
    GalleryCells
    This class is a part of View that helps in dissecting information from the Model that will be shown by the adapter.
    LoadingImageFiles
    This class loads images stored in the internal disk space of the application, and converts those images into Bitmap.
    PhotoEnlargementActivity
    This class enlarges the photo selected from the GalleryActivity.
    PhotoIntentActivity
    This class sends intent to built-in camera app, saves the photo temporarily in a placeholder file, scale down the photo before loading into memory, converts into bitmap and keeps on scaling down until the size is 64kb, stores the photo in the internal private app space in .jpg format.
    PhotoIntentActivityTest  
    SlideshowActivity
    SlideshowActivity performs actions on the database and the SlideShowAdapter settings to run a seamless slide show of the photos stored in the device.
    SlideShowAdapter
    This class is an adapter for SlideshowActivity to show the images using ViewPager.
